name: Jump Games - Mr. Pants
description:
Choosing right moment to fall and wearing right pants to jump.This game is different from many other games you played before.It’s a relaxing and fun game.Get the best score and compare it on the Game Center .

Game Features:
-Addictive gameplay
-One-touch simple control
-Good creative game
-Great time killler
-Many pretty characters and scene for your choose.


How To Play:
-Slides down the screen while the character jumps to the top.
-Sliding pants for right pants color.
-Rebound highest and get stars.
